moodEntries.journalEntry: Had an amazing morning run and feel full of energy!
Spent time with family, feeling relaxed and thankful.
Routine day at work, nothing too exciting or stressful.
Tough day. Didn't sleep well and felt drained at work.
Got some bad news. Trying to process my emotions.
A good friend visited, which lifted my spirits a lot.
Feeling isolated. Need to talk to someone soon.
Woke up in a grouchy mood but it got better by evening.
Good progress on personal goals today, feeling proud.
Slept well and woke up ready to tackle new challenges.
Feeling a bit off. Hoping tomorrow is better.
Quiet day at home, reading and resting.
Had a productive morning cleaning and organizing.
Rough night of sleep. Need support and rest.
Woke up early and finally tackled a big project!

-2: I am allowed to feel what I feel.
This moment will not last forever.
I am safe in this moment, even as I feel this pain.
I've survived every difficult day so far.
I am doing the best I can right now.
-1: I am healing at my own pace.
I am taking things one moment at a time.
I choose to be gentle with myself today.
Small steps still move me forward.
0: I am present in this moment.
I am open to what today might bring.
1: I notice what is going well.
I celebrate my progress, no matter how small.
My positive energy affects those around me.
2: I let myself enjoy this feeling.
I fully embrace this moment of joy.
